org.magnos.asset.json
Interface JsonValue

All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonArray, JsonBoolean, JsonNull, JsonNumber, JsonObject, JsonString
public interface JsonValue

A generic value in JSON.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer
See Also:
JsonNull, JsonArray, JsonObject, JsonNumber, JsonString, JsonBoolean

Method Detail

getObject

Object getObject()
Returns:
The internal object.

getType

JsonType getType()
Returns:
The value type.

toJson

String toJson()
Returns:
This value converted to a JSON string.

write

void write(JsonWriter out)
           throws IOException
Writes this value out to a writer. A writer has formatting options and can write out to several different things.

Parameters:
out - The JsonWriter to write to.
Throws:
IOException - An error occurred writing this value out to the writer.
